p: Antifungal activity against Candida albicans (ATCC 10231) and Malassezia furfur (ATCC 14521) were evaluated in terms of MICs by using a similar micro-method but by employing Sabouraud broth (Sigma-Aldrich, Milan, Italy) or Sabouraud broth with added 2% olive oil in the case of M. furfur, as growth media, and with an incubation time of 48 h.
